description: More than 4,825 people have died in Italy since the coronavirus outbreak began.
title: Coronavirus: Lombardy region announces stricter measures
title_page: Coronavirus: Lombardy region announces stricter measures - BBC News
maintext: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo hit out at young people who he claims have been ignoring orders not to gather in groups. He said that he planned to visit a park "to see what the situation is myself".
